Nintendo Switch port of the Tlicolity Eyes games.

Tlicolity Eyes is a part of "triAngle PROJECT," a collaboration project between Otomate and Frontier Works. Each series will have 3 games released in span of 9 months for Windows under the same concept: one heroine, two heroes, and triangle love.

Tlicolity Eyes theme is entertainment industry x love comedy x triangle love.

name: Majestic Majolical vol. 1
description: Majestic Majolical is a otome game focusing on the young witch Lapis as she ventures to the human world in order to harvest twilight gems in order to try and regain some semblance of respect from her peers.

name: BadMan
description: BadMan is a game where you shoot BadMans with your gun and they keep spawning faster as you kill them. You just shoot some 2D characters called BadMans and try to survive

name: Hydlide 1・2・ 3
description: This compilation features T&E Soft's original Hydlide trilogy of '80s action-RPGs. Both the '84 original and Hydlide 3 (aka Super Hydlide) have been remade for Windows users, with new graphics, audio, and quality-of-life additions. These remakes are available via the Arrange Mode option for each game, except Hydlide 2 which lacks said upgrades. Beyond the games themselves, there's a detailed manual with both hints and full answers for tricky puzzles. You can also enjoy the "Hydlide Museum", an included website containing developer commentary, concept art, and other goodies detailing the series' history.

name: Majestic Majolical vol. 2
description: The second volume of Majestic Majolical.

name: Majestic Majolical vol. 3
description: The third volume of Majestic Majolical.

name: Doubt: Anata wa Dark na Uso ga Suki?
description: An otome game by Voltage Inc. It is currently available in Japanese.

name: Doubt: Moteru Otoko wa Konkatsu Appli ni Uso to Hisomu
description: An otome game by Voltage Inc. It is currently available in Japanese.

name: Fake: Geinoujin wa Zen'in Usotsuki?
description: An otome game by Voltage Inc. that's currently available in Japanese.

name: Mini Doubt: Gouka Kyakusen-hen
description: A new Doubt story with a shorter duration that adds randomization to the mix!

name: Mini Doubt: Usotsuki Onna-hen
description: The first game in the Doubt series where the protagonist is male!

name: Mini Doubt: Towerman-hen
description: Otome game by Voltage.

name: Liquisity
description:
Liquisity is a problem-solving action game where players must get a ball past obstacles into a goal. Each level is set underwater. The player is given a cannon which can be used to fire a ball with varying force. Once a ball is launched, the player can control it to a limited degree with the left and right arrow keys. The player can launch another if a ball is destroyed or offscreen.

The levels contain obstacles and elements such as fans which block the way, sharp fans which destroy the ball, bubble jets which propel the ball in a specific direction, and others. Solving the level often involves carefully hitting switches to deactivate inconvenient obstacles. There are several different types of balls, in addition to the basic one: the metal ball is heavy and hard to control, but it can shatter glass barriers; the seltzer ball slowly dissolves in water and thus has a limited lifetime, but it can fit in tight spaces and avoid obstacles when shrunk, and it can be made to float upwards at any time. There is also a helicopter ball, which can move freely in any direction but cannot exit the level.

The game includes a built-in level editor and some unlockable bonus content.

name: Ore no Ryomi 2
description:
Ore no Ryomi 2: The Restaurant is a restaurant management game. Similarly to its predecessor, it's an action-strategy game where the player must manage his funds and personally prepare all the dishes for the customers.

Before the start of each day, the player can spend money to purchase expansions for his restaurant, including new food menu items and proper equipment. Once the day starts, the player must manage his time carefully to cater to all the customers and the restaurant's needs from morning till closing hours.

Throughout the day, new customers keep coming in and ordering food, and events (such as the need to wash dishes or a fire in the kitchen) require the manager's attention. Each customer and event is represented by a gradually vanishing bar. Preparing food and caring for problems is usually done through a simple, action minigame. The player can only take on one of these at a time, but it is possible to serve prepared meals to customers in the middle of something else.

Each customer expects his food to be prepared strictly according to order. If the player messes something up by adding the wrong ingredients or by under- or overcooking the food, the customer will pay less. And if a customer waits too long without their order being attended to, they get furious and leave, causing a minor monetary penalty. Things get even more hectic during the "Rush Hour" that comes twice daily, during which large crowds of customers keep coming in.

Ore no Ryomi 2 also contains several "Challenges": the player, invited to the Iron Chef TV show, tries to complete a specific difficult task, such as preparing many perfect dishes in a limited time. Throughout the game, the player receives trophies and awards, which he can proudly view in his Trophy Room if he has purchased them.

name: Storm Rider 2
description: Storm Rider 2 is a new motion-based motorbike racing game for arcades and FEC’s so, riders start your engines! The impressive two player cabinet with futuristic bikes and impressive fully lit billboard captures players attention at any location. The motion delivers an unprecedented immersive racing experience. Combined with stunning graphics produced by the Unreal Engine and Boost function players will experience blazing fast speeds.

name: Mario's Castle
description: Mario's Castle was a game announced for the cancelled "Project Atlantis" portable system.

name: In the Groove 2
description: An unreleased PlayStation 2 port of In the Groove 2.

name: The Legend of Heroes V: Umi no Oriuta
description: The Legend of Heroes V: Umi no Oriuta (Cagesong of the Ocean) is the fifth installment in Falcom's long-running RPG franchise and the final entry in the "Gargarv Trilogy." The title was publish by Falcom initially for the PC on December 9, 1999 and was later remade for the PlayStation Portable by MiCROViSion in 2006.

name: Speleomorph
description:
Go spelunking, discover new shapes, and return to the surface transformed!

Speleomorph is a nonlinear puzzle game made for Metroidvania Month 16, inspired by the Shapeshifting theme.

name: The Legend of Heroes IV: Akai Shizuku
description: The Legend of Heroes IV: Akai Shizuku is the fourth entry in Falcom's Legend of Heroes RPG series and the second installment in the "Gagharv Trilogy." The game was originally developed and published by Falcom for the NEC PC-98 on March 24, 1996 with ports being released for the PlayStation in 1998 and PC in 2000.

name: Stick Warfare: Blood Strike
description: A mobile game which involves you, as a stick figure, to play solo or online multiplayer in various game modes against zombies or numerous enemies by using and upgrading various skills, perks, weapons and gears.

name: 8 Bitty Games
description: Sin descripción

name: Bare Witness
description: Bare Witness is an adult visual novel that will have multiple endings, in which choices will play a major part in how the story resolves.

name: Hermitcraft TCG
description: Hermitcraft Trading Card Game, created by Vintage Beef and first featured on a Minecraft Server known as Hermitcraft, is a traditional TCG. Its cards revolve around the members of Hermitcraft, theming moves and characteristics around the personalities of its cast. It has since been turned into an open source community driven game that can be played in a web browser!

name: The Lightkeeper
description: You've decided to take up a job offer as a lightkeeper. You'll be there for a month, and you'll have a partner so you don't go insane. All you have to do is man the light and the foghorn, nothing could go wrong, right?

name: Gensmak! Food Fight!
description: Standalone expansion of Gensmak! party trivia. Gensmak! Food Fight! includes trivia questions featuring culinary pop culture from Gen Z back through the Greatest Generation. Just like in the main game, Gensmak!, there's strategy needed to win, hints by comedians, and questions for every generation.

name: Deep Rock Galactic: Survivor
description: Deep Rock Galactic: Survivor is a single player survivor-like auto-shooter. Wield the full arsenal of Deep Rock Galactic, take on hordes of lethal aliens, mine riches, and unlock powerful upgrades. It's one dwarf against all of Planet Hoxxes!

name: Touhou Rououmu
description: A fan demake of Touhou Youyoumu for NES.

name: F1 23
description: The award-winning F1 series is the official videogame of the FIA Formula One World Championship, putting players in the driving seat of the greatest racing spectacle on Earth.

name: Super1337
description: Super1337 is an intense 3rd person hack-n-slash wave based survival game with time dilation mechanics made in Unreal Engine. With both Melee and Ranged based characters, persevere against increasingly difficult odds by utilizing different move sets and combos in bullet-time combat.

name: Riri & Coco
description:
Riri & Coco are prisoners of the drawing book !
To get out of the book you have to solve the puzzle by collaborating as fast as possible.

name: Game of Whores
description: You play for the former manager of a brothel, the goal is to return to the business and at the same time to help the 3 main heroines of the game to achieve power and influence.​

name: Solo
description: (Not) a lonely night.

name: Tiny x Machinegun
description: An otome game by Rejet.

name: Portaball
description: Sin descripción

name: Alice=Alice
description: An otome game by Rejet for PC.

name: Hyakki Rinne
description: Included in the "StoryMe" app.

name: My Next Life as a Villainess: All Routes Lead to Doom!
description: My Next Life as a Villainess: All Routes Lead to Doom! ~comes to StoryMe!~ is a collaboration between ASMIK ACE and StoryMe, released in April 5, 2020 for Android and IOS platforms. The game officially received an English release for the world-wide version of the StoryMe app on Sept. 16, 2020. Each episode of the game was released alongside the animation broadcast. It has 19 episodes, with the first 12 being a retelling of the anime's story, and the last few being the respective 7 endings of the capture targets.

name: Dorico no Toshokan
description: An upcoming otome game by Rejet.

name: That Lonesome Valley
description: A short retro-style gay romance game / visual novel about walking, sheepherding, and kissing.

name: Clockmachine Chaos
description: Oh no! The clockmachine is broken. It's up to you to save it!

name: Age of Wonders 4: Premium Edition
description: Age of Wonders 4 Premium Edition gives you access to the base game, as well as the Expansion Pass. The Expansion Pass will grant you the first two major expansions and two content packs.

name: Ski Resort Driver
description: Welcome to the Ski Resort Driver! Start your vacation today and drive a huge roster of ‘Winter Vehicles’ around the cute snow covered ski village!

name: Nanoforce: Tactical Surgeon Fighter
description: Climb into the cockpit of an overpowered micro unit and fight against an invisible treath that kill human race. progress through numerous ennemy waves, bosses across more than 7 levels with action, secrets and more !

name: Ghosts from the House of Flesh
description: Ghosts from the House of Flesh is a horror puzzle game made in 2D pixel art. In the game, you have to collect hidden totems in the forest with ghosts of all kinds.

name: Eden Eternal: Seikyou Densetsu
description: The return of classic MMORPG ! Global Direct Operations!Rich gameplays and multiple updates. Ride adorable alpaca and start your adventure with players worldwide!

name: Mr. E
description: MR.E is a visual novel with turn-based puzzle mechanics in which you discover what happened to a spaceship heading to Titan. Overcome challenges thrown at you by the ship’s rogue AI and support the surviving crew members.

name: Lachesis or Atropos
description: This world is woven of strings, of fate and of hate. What do you see, detective? A horror-mystery yuri visual novel peering into the maddening darkness of love and death.

name: Shambhala Gateway
description: Designed with peaceful yet adventuristic and unique environment, immersive activities, Meditation and relaxation experience. You will achieve wonderful and cohesive relaxion experience

name: College Bound: Episode 5
description: College Bound: Episode 5 DLC is the final part of the epic adult visual novel developed by FOZ. Bigger, better and naughtier than ever before. Are you ready?

name: Hentai Casual Slider 3
description: Enjoy this new casual puzzle with dozens of nice illustrations for you to enjoy and relax. With an open gallery for simply relaxing and some voices too!

name: Search All: Fruits
description: is a Hidden Object game where you have to find all the fruits in a large area. Fruits will be located in a variety of places, from the most visible to the barely noticeable places

name: I Expect You to Die 3
description: Outwit your most cunning adversary to date in the latest installment of this award-winning, spy-themed VR puzzle series. Wield new gadgets, visit action-packed locales, and wear custom disguises as you dive back into the world of espionage in this escape room game.

name: Parasocial
description: Parasocial is a Japanese horror game about a live streamer.

name: SharkKing
description: You play as a rogue shark, battle your way up the food chain and become the shark king

name: ToyLand
description: Toyland is a world of abandoned and forgotten toys. Please help 'Hana' crash landing on this Toyland go back to the real world!!

name: SlovSurvival
description: A Zombie Round Survival Game set in a Biomechanical Fantasy Abandoned Island.

name: Skate Horse
description: This Equestrian Rage Platformer stars a viral skateboarding horse who dies suddenly, and must grind, ollie and flip their way out of the hell out of PFFH (Purgatory For Famous Horses). Will you suffer a fate of damnation, or do you say neigh to death?

name: Dude Simulator 5
description: Dude Simulator 5 is an open world sandbox game. Your goal is to become president! However, it will not be so easy to do this, which means that many adventures await you on your way.

name: Hentai Puzzles: The Origin
description: Meet Melissa and Amanda in this casual Hentai puzzle game.

name: Destrium
description: You find yourself in a maze-like structure that seemingly stretches on endlessly. Your main goal is to survive in this unpleasent environment. There are different kinds of worlds, each one of them has a different theme, different monsters inhabiting it and different resources.

name: Pandora
description: "Rpg Maker game, The pandora is the best game for the people who love big tits. It contain 42CG with 50 Moving CG. It also have many minigames. "

name: Ancient Saga: Vikings Journey
description: Thor and the Vikings are on a mission to save Midgard from Fenrir. To achieve their aim, they take a daring journey to Ancient Greece in search of a remedy. However, they soon realize that the task ahead of them will be harder than they imagined.

name: The Gunslinger
description: Annihilate an ever-growing horde of monsters to survive. Unlock & choose from a variety of upgrades to create unique and game-breaking builds. Play a variety of game modes for the ultimate monster-slaying experience!

name: Dragon Escape
description: Sin descripción

name: Stack Island
description: After waking on a seemingly deserted Island, you’ll need to piece together the clues to survive and remember what happened. Exploring the island will unlock new recipes and cards, which can be used to craft tools to explore new areas.

name: Deadlock Station
description: Turn the battlefield into your ally in this tactical rogue-like with indirect controls. Assemble a unique squad, destroy the alien invaders with precise planning, and uncover the truth about the Event and the mysterious disappearance of humans.

name: Pporite
description: Abandon the tedious and systematic cultivation action rouge game, choose the right fruit and skills to cultivate the nearby Pporite, and skills react with Pporite, skills and skills to protect yourself until the arrival of 20 minutes...

name: Sliding Swords
description: A roguelite, dungeon crawler, where you move all objects at the same time, and the same types that touch - merge into one! Defeat enemies, level up, solve quests, unlock new things, upgrade your character, and cast powerful spells! This game is a part of the TAnima Universe.

name: Asteroid Arcade
description: Shoot lasers in space because a fish told you to. Asteroid Arcade is a side-scrolling space shoot-em-up which tells the story of a man side-scrolling in space and shooting-em-up. This game has at least 2 characters in it.

name: Peasant Kingdom
description: Peasant Kingdom is a multiplayer survival game in which the player starts as a poor peasant and can eventually develop into a powerful king with his own castle.

name: Dice Survivor
description: Unleash your inner hero as a dwarf wielding a massive dice adorned with runes and precious stones. Fight for survival in a perilous dungeon, forging walls of dice and imbuing them with magic. Discover the captivating story behind the creation of your powerful weapon. Can you emerge victorious?

name: Altwaldheim 2: Town in Trouble
description: Become the mayor in this medieval-inspired rogue-like fantasy city builder. Take control of the treacherous city council. Build settlements, boost the economy, and explore the nearby dungeons! Transform Altwaldheim into a thriving metropolis and win in auto battles against your opponents!

name: I Heard There are Monsters Here
description: "I Heard There Are Monsters Here" is a pixel , idle game. The monsters from the beast Land can never be killed forever. At the same time, the Land has countless minerals and wealth. Only when you have courage and wisdom at the same time, can you survive on the beast continent.

name: Wave of Vengeance
description: Before you is a tactical weapon of the last class designed to stop the invasion. There is no time to think, eternal winter is already close and will soon capture the entire planet!

name: Intergalactic Genocide
description: The zombie epidemic, which is the first stage of the 3 stage alien attack, has begun, the governments have banned news channels from reporting on it until they know more about the subject, but they were unable to control social media quickly. .

name: Hot Secretary Puzzle
description: Hot Secretary Puzzle - is a simple yet tempting 2D puzzle game about the pleasure of having a secretary. But not a regular, a hot one!

name: Busway Islands
description: Busway Islands is a puzzle game about organizing roads and rails across a large archipelago. Your goal is to create a safe and efficient route between bus stations, ensuring that all passengers are picked up along the way.

name: Grow Your Team
description: In this 2D RPG platformer, you fight enemies, gain seeds, and grow different body parts to build custom characters with unique abilities. Upgrade their intelligence, combat proficiency, acquire new skills, and discover new weapons and unique items. Let’s Grow Your Team!

name: Draft: In the Woods
description: Draft - In the woods is a casual, relaxing and challenging puzzle game. Solve the levels by removing all the nodes using neatly drawn line cuts.

name: Vasilisa and Baba Yaga
description: An adventure game based on the Russian folktale "Vasilisa the Beautiful". A scary story about the journey to the mistress of the forbidden forest for magical powers.

name: Kernel Quest
description: Kernel Quest is a sandbox puzzle game. Design and build machines to protect a village against impossible odds.

name: Virtual Near Death Experience
description: We want to create experiences in VR that are impossible in the ordinary world You take off into another dimension, otherworldly beautiful sounds, float without a body. This is our artistic interpretation of hundreds of readings about near-death experiences. A first person experience.

name: Zombie Within
description: A Zombie imposter with virus vials slips into a survivor camp protected by a group of defenders and tries to kill the population. 2-6 players exciting social deduction with friends mixed with horror and strategy.

name: Hentai Festival
description: Hentai Festival is a relaxing puzzle game. With the theme of festival and 24 unique sexy girls. Enjoy sexy girls pictures and relaxing music to complete the puzzle.

name: Poly Smash
description: Poly Smash is for 2-8 players. In the game you have to DESTROY the environment using a range of abilities and COMPETE against everyone to get the HIGHEST SCORE! The levels are randomised each game and are filled with many objects that can be destroyed for points.

name: Infernal Elements
description: A literal bullet hell, boss rush game, where you control Luci on his journey fighting against elemental demons.

name: Cx6
description: Cx6 is an arcade-style bullet hell game about deflecting off walls and manipulating gravity to avoid being struck by an endless wave of bullets.

name: Eggsplorer
description: A game in which you control an egg-shaped player to explore 4 unique levels.

name: Spaceship Ace Pilot
description: Spaceship Ace Pilot is a physics driven space simulation game that will push your skills to the limit. Your goal is to collect all power cells in the level in order to execute a hyper jump to the next level. Do you have what it takes to be the best spaceship pilot in the galaxy?

name: Captain the Looper
description: Captain the Looper is a wave action-shooter game where you take control of Captain The Looper and defend planet Earth from invading aliens. With the help of the entire planet, you must successfully protect humanity.

name: Hello Exo
description: It is the year 2072. Recent research has revealed how to locate an Earth-like exoplanet. You were shipped there. Your mission is to repair the spaceship, keep people in hibernation pods alive, and prepare the exoplanet for their arrival.

name: Farm Empire
description: Would you like to be the world's richest farmer? In Farm Empire, you'll start your own farm from scratch, but with the right strategy, you'll soon have an entire empire.

name: Lost in the Void
description: Lost in the Void is an isometric pixel art walking simulator with RPG elements inspired by the 80's nostalgia. Currently under development.

name: Atham Battle Simulator
description: Fight your way to glory by conquering humans, demons & corrupted veggies in "Atham Battle Simulator". Don't let the bananas scare you from not playing this!

name: Crusader's March
description: Vanquish the ever-growing hordes, Command your army, grow in strength and numbers, and conquer your enemy's castles in this casual top-down roguelite.

name: Copter Strike VR
description: A fun, high-flying VR experience where players engage in intense multiplayer battles as helicopter pilots. Players can maneuver their choppers to take out enemies with a combination of turret and rocket fire. The low-poly environment provides a visually stunning backdrop for intense dogfights.

name: Makato: Your Fantasy Shop
description: Build your own medieval fantasy shop and sell armor, weapons, potions and more to earn money. Send out adventurers to gather goods and combine them to create more powerful and more valuable goods.

name: Embarrassed Shina-chan: The Naked Wandering College Girl
description: Get up in the morning and see a naked female college student lying on the shadow in front of the station closest to the university If you are discovered by the police, your life will become messy! The 3D invisible action game of betting on Shy's life began ...

name: BanHown
description: There was a widespread epidemic crisis, causing utilities and industry to halt, resulting in famine until the city became uninhabited. This forced people to rely on themselves for survival. However there is a family area coming and have decided to return to live in other provinces.

name: Twin Stick Heroes 2
description: The wild and wacky sequel! Gather up to 3 of your friends and battle it out with the iconic weird and wonderful upgraded cast of 'heroes', or go alone or with a friend in the base-building rpg-lite campaign.

name: Trance, Trauma
description: Prepare your pen and paper as you puzzle through three surreal hexagon rooms! You'll write, draw, cut, fold, solve, decode, and decipher. Trance, Trauma will test your resourcefulness in using real-world tools as you overcome increasingly complex challenges and uncover a tragic incident's aftermath.

name: Edemn
description: Edemn is a fun and dynamic shooter about skeletons who have risen through ancient magic and are now fighting among themselves. The game is made in the style of games of the early 2000s, which creates a cool atmosphere for the game.

name: Goblin's Journey
description: Goblin's Journey is a humorous adventure game with a stupid plot and even more idiotic characters. You play as a greedy bastard goblin named Alastar. You are about to save you king's life - in exchange for gold of course! An adventure full of gold, mischief and innapropriate content.

name: Legends of Castile
description: Legends of Castile is a fantasy and comedy point and click adventure set in Spain in the 19th century, in the region known as Castile, which is about a village girl who has to investigate the folk legends of Castile to fulfill her dream, to become a nun.

name: Acronia
description: Lead Allie, Roslyn, Harry, "Dad," and Buddy, employees of military security firm "Acronia." Due to an accident, the facility you work at has been overrun by mutants. Your only goal is to escape, and kill any monsters that try to stop you!

name: Hot Blood
description: Take down zombies as a deadly cutie in 3D low-poly style! Hot Blood is physics-based brawling fun inspired by action movies of the 80s & 90s.

name: Exit Doors
description: You play a series of Escape rooms and try to find a missing red stapler to get a date. Solve puzzles and mysteries in a classic point-n-click adventure.

name: Ballooni
description: Happiness has a name: Ballooni! Just play Ballooni and have fun!

name: Everybody's Stranger
description: Heroic adventure awaits in... some other game. In this one, you run an inn, kind of against your will. Cook, farm, craft, and decorate to attract bards, rogues, and other persnickety malcontents, each with their own strange tale. After all, they’re the heroes – you’re just their innkeeper.

name: Rad Survivor
description: Cartoon rougelite survival in a post-apocalyptic wasteland.

name: I Remember
description: Step into the shoes of a Father and Son as they navigate the challenges of taking care of one another in 'I Remember', a psychological horror game. Traverse through decaying environments as you hide from terrors that threaten to consume you.

name: The Holy Gosh Darn
description: The Holy Gosh Darn is a narrative adventure with a time-travelling twist. Time travel to jump between the past and present across Heaven, Hell, Earth and Helheim. Uncover information in one timeline to alter things in another in a bid to stop your universe from going bang. Again.

name: Sky Strikers VR
description: Sky Strikers merges sports excitement with immersive VR. Anticipate ball flight, boost with your rocket, and strike for the ultimate "moment" in sports gaming. Experience it for yourself!

name: Teleport VR
description: With Teleport VR, you can explore ancient Egypt and Rome, medieval times, and even science fiction futuristic locations, all from the comfort of your own home. Image and category libraries will continue to expand with new fascinating locations and themes.

name: 1000 Man General
description: Command an army of 1000 troops. Create squads from a variety of unit types and give them orders to perform devastating strategic maneuvers. Then lead your army into battle and slice the opposing army into pieces.

name: RC Match 3
description: Shift entire Rows or Columns to match symbols in this colorful, low-stress Match 3 game. Use the shifting board to your advantage to build your personal high score. Customize your theme with different backgrounds, symbols, and colors. Relax and enjoy a streamlined, ad-free puzzle experience.

name: Cosmic Holes
description: Cosmic Holes is a logic puzzle game based on the 5 elements of Chinese cosmology: Wood, Fire, Earth, Metal, and Water. Solve and maintain the balance of the elements in an environment that adapts to your own energy. Relaxing and explosive!

name: Railways: Train Simulator
description: Mind the gap and start managing your railways through this strategic journey! All aboard! This train is ready to depart!

name: Let's Play Jigsaw Puzzles: Nordics
description: Immerse yourself in the rich culture and history of the Nordics

name: StormEdge
description: StormEdge is a high-stakes action-roguelite adventure with a heavy emphasis on precision and skills! Take the role of one of the bravest talented mages and save the world off the dangerous elemental tempests threatening the civilization.

name: Spiritoké
description: A roguelite turn-based rpg. Gather mystical treasures to power up your party and engage in battle with monsters that become stronger with every step within a dungeon! Each character has unique abilities to dominate the battlefield, growing in strength as the journey continues!

name: Fantasy Survivors
description: A rogue-lite where you fight thousands of creatures, unlocking characters and equipment, to challenge deeper levels. Team up with friends or go solo; all drops are instanced so you don't have to share. Satisfying gameplay combined with smart choices make one-more-run a no-brainer.

name: Mother Dear
description: "Mother Dear" is a heartwarming game where you play as a deer and follow a father's story told to his daughter about the childhood trauma that changed his life. Experience nature's beauty and uncover secrets of the father's past. With an emotional story, you'll have an unforgettable adventure

name: AntiVirus_Snake
description: Welcome to "AntiVirus_snake" where you play as a cyber snake fighting computer viruses on computers. You will have to pass exciting levels with interesting tasks in order to remove all viruses from the computer.

name: Midnight Horde
description: Midnight Horde is a gothic horror casual action game with rogue-lite elements where you battle thousands of enemies and upgrade the castle. Discover the secrets of the castle and upgrade weapons and fortifications to keep darkness at bay.

name: Neon Death Drop
description: A fabulous, fast-paced top-down action game Control and manipulate your environment; Slay rogue robots with stylish go-go dance moves; Sling enemies around with dazzling kinetic force!

name: Draft Day Sports: College Basketball 2023
description: Draft Day Sports: College Basketball 2023 puts you in the role of head coach of your favorite college basketball team. Every decision can be made by you from staff hiring, recruiting, scouting and all the way to making each substitution to lead your team to tournament glory and becoming a dynasty.

name: Poly Jigsaw: Birds
description: Poly Jigsaw: Birds is a traditional style jigsaw puzzle game, with a cute birdies.

name: Monster Battle
description: "Monster Battle" is a cute and charming roguelike deck builder featuring adorable monsters. Journey through a randomly generated world, build an army of monsters and defeat foes with strategic deckbuilding.

name: Lakatos
description: Lakatos is an open-world RPG fantasy game focused on magical quests. Explore a beautifully crafted world filled with diverse characters, challenging combat, and rewarding crafting systems. Take on quests both big and small as you unravel a grand adventure in a world filled with wonder and danger.

name: Run-Gunners' Revenge
description: Run-Gunners’ Revenge is a 3rd/1st person, retro inspired, action platformer shooter, Where you, REX, last survivor of the elite legendary Run-Gunners, enact revenge against a tyrannical occupying force, by blasting and platforming your way through hordes of formidable enemies.

name: Sky Survivors
description: Sky Survivors is an arena shooter roguelite. Choose from a variety of upgrades, unlock unique characters and weapons. Build «stairway to heaven» — a sky tower, each floor of which gives your character a unique bonus. Create your own overpowered build to survive against hordes of monsters!

name: Brickmasters
description: A physics based brick building game

name: Police Heroes
description: Use multiple heroes, each with their own choices, abilities and play style to defeat the zombie apocalypse! Play several stages in different locations, against hordes of increasingly stronger and more dangerous zombies. All this with a unique mechanic where damage equals money!

name: Kanji Industry
description: Kanji Industry is an roguelike automatic kanji production game. Players build a production line by arranging machines. The entire game progresses in a deck-building roguelike format. You can get the machine by clearing the stage. Let's enjoy high strategy!

name: Corlero
description: A fantasy auto-battler with roguelike elements. With 56 units and 72 trait variants in each of the 3 factions, every run is unique. Construct your best team, manage your economy and choose key battles to retry. How will you sculpt your path to victory?

name: The Sewer Job
description: You were on the brink of becoming homeless, but that's when you found a sewer job application, you got accepted. What seemed like a chill work at first turned quickly in to an unsettling experience.

name: Dash King
description: Run and dash your way through danger in this super-fast action game!

name: Step Quest
description: Darkness has swallowed the world, arise from the shadows as a bastion of light and fight! Explore a deceptive world, meet characters, fulfill quests, acquire powerful items, defeat powerful enemies and more! Will you uncover the truth that lies within?

name: Crystal Guardians
description: Crystal Guardians is a tower defense game with rogue-like elements. Fight of waves and defend the world crystal. Gear up your towers with a powerful combination of items for your strategy. In an ever expanding map, find hidden powers and conquer the enemies.

name: Space Dust
description: An action packed strategic space adventure with trading and procedural generation. A space vagabond with a gambling problem must trade and fight off pirates to pay a debt before he is turned into space dust.

name: Five Nights at Stalin
description: A horror game in which the main antagonist is Stalin himself, or rather his statue. The player must use all the resources given to him to stand up to the mighty foe, or else he will face either dismissal or something worse...

name: Grimmy Tales
description: Grimmy Tales is a Metroidvania-Platformer with a sprawling world for the player to explore. With a hand-crafted story and world fit for the best explorers.

name: The War
description: "The War" is a unique real-time war game. It has the fierce war of RTS, aircraft tank, missile laser; It is a real strategic game, operating base, expanding territory, and planning vertically and horizontally; Drive the Core Gear to command the battlefield to change the dark and turbulent world!

name: Red Knight: Light RPG
description: This is a short and rather funny short RPG work.

name: Not For Broadcast: Bits of Your Life
description: Think you know Peter Clement? Show the new enigmatic Prime Minister in a whole new light on the always popular chat show, "Bits Of Your Life"!

name: Tank Hunter Tow Operator
description: Tank Hunter is a simulator in which you play as a member of one of the elite units fighting armored vehicles and destroying high-value targets. Personalize your weapon, choose the right place, prepare your fighting position and reach for victory by destroying enemy units.

name: Scroll Scramble
description: A maze puzzle game about an inept wizard who, in a desperate attempt to finally learn some magic, travels into his magical scrolls to hunt down the knowledge he seeks.

name: Defendun
description: It is a real-time power defense merge game. Players can combine warriors, archers, and wizards to create a strong hero to fend off attacks from demons.
